Instead of using the full training set median for imputation, apply median imputation only on the training set (per feature), but introduce a small regularization by clipping the median to be within 1% of the interquartile range (IQR) to reduce outliers' influence on imputation. This helps stabilize the median estimate and may reduce variance in feature distributions during training.)
